conclusion: Analyze wave motion and positions of particles to determine meeting time.
Wave sources at x=-0.2m and x=1.2m; wave speed is 0.4m/s.
Particle P at x=0.2m and particle Q at x=0.8m; wave period is 3.5s.
Time for wave to reach P: Distance/Speed = 0.2m/0.4m/s = 0.5s.
Time for wave to reach Q: Distance/Speed = -0.4m/0.4m/s = -1s.
Negative time indicates travel from x=1.2m to x=0.8m.
Wave from x=-0.2m reaches P at t=0.5s; wave from x=1.2m reaches Q at t=-1s.
Negative time indicates travel from x=1.2m to x=0.8m.
Time for wave to reach Q: Distance/Speed = -0.4m/0.4m/s = -1s.
Negative time indicates travel from x=1.2m to x=0.8m.
